name: honey-badger-testing
description: A collection of scripts to test the Honey Badger BFT integration in Parity

scripts.build-open-ethereum-perf: export RUSTFLAGS='-C target-cpu=native' && cargo build --manifest-path ../diamond-node/Cargo.toml --profile perf
scripts.ui-new: cd ../dmd-ui && export REACT_APP_URL=http://38.242.206.143:8545 && npm run start
scripts.performance-latency1: npm-run-all backup logCurrentBlockNumber t_latency_5m_single_transactions --sequential logBlocksAsCsv backup
scripts.performance-latency2: npm-run-all backup logCurrentBlockNumber --parallel t_latency_5m_baseline10tx t_latency_5m_single_transactions --sequential logBlocksAsCsv backup
scripts.performance-throughput1: npm-run-all backup logCurrentBlockNumber t_throughput_single logBlocksAsCsv backup
scripts.performance-throughput2: npm-run-all backup logCurrentBlockNumber --parallel t_throughput_p1 t_throughput_p2 t_throughput_p3 t_throughput_p4 t_throughput_p5 t_throughput_p6 t_throughput_p7 --sequential logBlocksAsCsv backup
scripts.updateHbbftAbi: mkdir -p src/hbbftAbi && rm -fr src/hbbftAbi && mkdir src/hbbftAbi && cp ../diamond-contracts-core/build/contracts/*.json src/hbbftAbi/
scripts.runAllPerformanceTests: npm-run-all performance-latency1 waitAMinute performance-latency2 waitAMinute performance-throughput1 waitAMinute waitAMinute performance-throughput2
scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=localhost && npm run build-open-ethereum && npm run testnet-fresh && npm run net-add-validator-each-epoch | tee testnet/nodes/addOneValidatorEachEpoch.log
scripts.repos-contracts-copy-abis: mkdir -p src/abi/json/ && find ../diamond-contracts-core/artifacts/contracts/ -name '*.json' -exec cp {} src/abi/json/ \; && rm src/abi/json/*.dbg.json
scripts.repos-contracts-compile: cd ../diamond-contracts-core && npm run compile && npm run flat
scripts.net-spam-txs-parallel: npm-run-all --parallel t_throughput_p1 t_throughput_p2 t_throughput_p3 t_throughput_p4 t_throughput_p5 t_throughput_p6 t_throughput_p7 t_throughput_p8 t_throughput_p9 t_throughput_p10 t_throughput_p11 t_throughput_p12 t_throughput_p13 t_throughput_p14
scripts.db-start-local: cd db && envsubst < grafana/templates/postgres.yaml > grafana/provisioning/datasources/postgres.yaml && docker compose up
scripts.localnet-blockscout-fresh: cd testnet/blockscout-local && docker compose down && docker compose up
scripts.localnet-fresh-new: export STAKING_TRANSITION_WINDOW_LENGTH=120 && VALIDATOR_INACTIVITY_THRESHOLD=307584000 && export STAKING_EPOCH_DURATION=432 && export MINIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=1 && export MAXIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=240 && ts-node ./src/localnet/runCreateTestnet.ts
scripts.localnet-fresh-test-early-epoch-end: export STAKING_TRANSITION_WINDOW_LENGTH=240 && VALIDATOR_INACTIVITY_THRESHOLD=1209600 && export STAKING_EPOCH_DURATION=60000 && export MINIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=1 && export MAXIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=30 && ts-node ./src/localnet/runCreateTestnet.ts --network=nodes-local-test-early-epoch-end
scripts.localnet-fresh-auto-restake: export STAKING_TRANSITION_WINDOW_LENGTH=240 && VALIDATOR_INACTIVITY_THRESHOLD=1209600 && export STAKING_EPOCH_DURATION=600 && export MINIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=10 && export MAXIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=30 && ts-node ./src/localnet/runCreateTestnet.ts --network=nodes-local-test-auto-restake
scripts.testnet-testrun-early-epoch-end-test: npm-run-all testnet-kill-processes build-open-ethereum testnet-delete  localnet-fresh-test-early-epoch-end localnet-test-early-epoch-end-test
scripts.testnet-testrun-phoenix: npm-run-all build-open-ethereum testnet-delete testnet-kill-processes testnet-fresh-test-phoenix localnet-test-phoenix localnet-start-current
scripts.testnet-testrun-fork-test: npm-run-all build-open-ethereum testnet-kill-processes testnet-delete-fork-test testnet-fork-test-create testnet-start-fork-test
scripts.testnet-fresh: export STAKING_TRANSITION_WINDOW_LENGTH=120 && VALIDATOR_INACTIVITY_THRESHOLD=307584000 && export STAKING_EPOCH_DURATION=432 && export MINIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=3 && export MAXIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=240 && cd testnet && ./setup_testnet.py 1 27 && cd -
scripts.testnet-fresh-upgrade: export STAKING_TRANSITION_WINDOW_LENGTH=60 && VALIDATOR_INACTIVITY_THRESHOLD=1209600 && export STAKING_EPOCH_DURATION=1440 && export MINIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=1 && export MAXIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=60 && cd testnet && ./setup_testnet.py 1 27 && cd -
scripts.testnet-fresh-alpha2: export STAKING_TRANSITION_WINDOW_LENGTH=60 && VALIDATOR_INACTIVITY_THRESHOLD=307584000 && export STAKING_EPOCH_DURATION=1200 && export MINIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=3 && export MAXIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=600 && cd testnet && ./setup_testnet.py 1 27 && cd -
scripts.testnet-fresh-alpha3: export STAKING_TRANSITION_WINDOW_LENGTH=300 && VALIDATOR_INACTIVITY_THRESHOLD=2629800 && export STAKING_EPOCH_DURATION=1200 && export MINIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=3 && export MAXIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=600 && ts-node ./src/localnet/runCreateTestnet.ts --network nodes-alpha3
scripts.testnet-fresh-duo: export STAKING_TRANSITION_WINDOW_LENGTH=60 && VALIDATOR_INACTIVITY_THRESHOLD=1209600 && export STAKING_EPOCH_DURATION=120 && export MINIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=3 && export MAXIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=30 && cd testnet && ./setup_testnet.py 2 2 && cd -
scripts.testnet-fresh-single-for-unit-tests: export STAKING_TRANSITION_WINDOW_LENGTH=120 &&  VALIDATOR_INACTIVITY_THRESHOLD=1209600 && export STAKING_EPOCH_DURATION=432 && export MINIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=0 && export MAXIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=600 && cd testnet && ./setup_testnet.py 1 1 && cd -
scripts.testnet-fresh-regression: export STAKING_TRANSITION_WINDOW_LENGTH=60 &&  VALIDATOR_INACTIVITY_THRESHOLD=1209600 && export STAKING_EPOCH_DURATION=120 && export MINIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=1 && export MAXIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=30 && cd testnet && ./setup_testnet.py 6 6 && cd -
scripts.testnet-fresh-test-phoenix: export STAKING_TRANSITION_WINDOW_LENGTH=240 && VALIDATOR_INACTIVITY_THRESHOLD=1209600 && export STAKING_EPOCH_DURATION=60000 && export MINIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=1 && export MAXIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=2 && cd testnet && ./setup_testnet.py 4 4 && cd -
scripts.testnet-fresh-grow-me: export STAKING_TRANSITION_WINDOW_LENGTH=120 &&  VALIDATOR_INACTIVITY_THRESHOLD=1209600 && export STAKING_EPOCH_DURATION=600 && export MINIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=1 && export MAXIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=30 && cd testnet && ./setup_testnet.py 1 6 && cd -
scripts.testnet-fresh-no-epoch-switches: export STAKING_TRANSITION_WINDOW_LENGTH=60 && VALIDATOR_INACTIVITY_THRESHOLD=1209600 && export STAKING_EPOCH_DURATION=2629800 && export MINIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=1 && export MAXIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=60 && cd testnet && ./setup_testnet.py 4 4 && cd -
scripts.testnet-fresh-12hour: export STAKING_TRANSITION_WINDOW_LENGTH=600 &&  VALIDATOR_INACTIVITY_THRESHOLD=1209600 && export STAKING_EPOCH_DURATION=43200 && export MINIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=1 && export MAXIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=600 && cd testnet && ./setup_testnet.py 25 25 && cd -
scripts.testnet-test-availability-handling-fresh: export STAKING_TRANSITION_WINDOW_LENGTH=90 &&  VALIDATOR_INACTIVITY_THRESHOLD=1209600 && export STAKING_EPOCH_DURATION=120 && export MINIMUM_BLOCK_TIME=3 && export NETWORK_ID=666001 && cd testnet && ./setup_testnet.py 1 17 && cd - && export NODE_ENV=localhost && npm run testnet-test-availability-handling-current
